languages.text: "Надеюсь, эта дрянь не затронет Глейто. Уж больно много в нем железа..."
languages.translation_comment:
Aboard a corrupted Tech-Priest ship.
Pasqal: "The protocols for ministering to the machine spirits have been violated in a manner most profane. The ship's Noosphere is overrun with data-impurities!"

traits.locale_text: "Надеюсь, эта дрянь не затронет Глейто. Уж больно много в нем железа..."

languages.text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."
languages.translation_comment:
Aboard a corrupted Tech-Priest ship.
Pasqal: "The protocols for ministering to the machine spirits have been violated in a manner most profane. The ship's Noosphere is overrun with data-impurities!"
languages.original_text: "Надеюсь, эта дрянь не затронет Глейто. Уж больно много в нем железа..."

traits.locale_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

"I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

languages.text: 「この汚物がグライトに感染しなければいいんだが。あいつには金属が多すぎる…」
languages.original_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

traits.locale_text: 「この汚物がグライトに感染しなければいいんだが。あいつには金属が多すぎる…」

languages.text: "Ich hoffe, dieser Schmutz infiziert Glaito nicht. Er trägt zu viel Metall in sich ..."
languages.original_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich hoffe, dieser Schmutz infiziert Glaito nicht. Er trägt zu viel Metall in sich ..."

languages.text: « J'espère que cette souillure n'infectera pas Glaito. Il y a trop de métal en lui... »
languages.original_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

traits.locale_text: « J'espère que cette souillure n'infectera pas Glaito. Il y a trop de métal en lui... »

languages.text: «Espero que esta porquería no infecte a Glaito. Tiene muchas partes de metal...».
languages.original_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que esta porquería no infecte a Glaito. Tiene muchas partes de metal...».

languages.text: “我希望这些污秽不会感染格雷托，它身上的金属部分实在是太多了……”
languages.original_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."

traits.locale_text: “我希望这些污秽不会感染格雷托，它身上的金属部分实在是太多了……”

languages.text: "Umarım Glaito, kirden enfeksiyon kapmaz. İçi tamamen metalden ya..."
languages.original_text: "I hope this filth doesn't infect Glaito. There is too much metal in him..."
